Package org.jasig.cas.authentication.support

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AccountStateHandler
    Strategy pattern for handling directory-specific account state data.
    CasAttributeEncoder
    An encoder that defines how a CAS attribute is to be encoded and signed in the CAS validation response.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCasAttributeEncoder
    Abstract class to define common attribute encoding operations.
    DefaultAccountStateHandler
    Default account state handler.
    DefaultCasAttributeEncoder
    The default implementation of the attribute encoder that will use a per-service key-pair to encrypt the credential password and PGT when available.
    LdapPasswordPolicyConfiguration
    LDAP-specific password policy configuration container.
    OptionalWarningAccountStateHandler
    The component supports both opt-in and opt-out warnings on a per-user basis using a simple algorithm of three variables: warningAttributeName OptionalWarningAccountStateHandler.setWarningAttributeValue(String) warningAttributeValue} displayWarningOnMatch The first two parameters define an attribute on the user entry to match on, and the third parameter determines whether password expiration warnings should be displayed on match.
    PasswordExpiringWarningMessageDescriptor
    Message conveying account password expiration warning details.
    PasswordPolicyConfiguration
    Container for password policy configuration.
